text: The Fiesta Bowl is an American college football bowl game at the University of Phoenix Stadium near Phoenix, Arizona. It is the newest of the BCS games, as it was first played in 1971. It has usually matched a team from the Western Athletic Conference or the Big 12 against a very good team from another conference. ==Related pages== *Rose Bowl (game) *Sugar Bowl *Orange Bowl Category:College football Category:Sports in Phoenix, Arizona Category:1971 establishments in the United States
title: Fiesta Bowl
